column4: hi, when i watch HD videos it is getting stuck every second for a moment, this HD videos used to play smooth and now they dont. Does anybody have idea why?
you sure your graphics drivers are installed correctly? Also, have you checked the output module of your video player (if possible)?

I have Nvidia GeForce 8800 GTS, and the drivers have been installed correctly. I have been using system for over an year and this videos worked fine but no somehow they dont.  I am not sure how to check oï»¿utput module of my video player. I tried with VLC and Totem Movie Player. Do you think i should try other players?
